text: Susana Canales (born 5 September 1933) is a Spanish film and television actress. Initially a child actor she switched to playing grown-up parts in the early 1950s. She starred in the 1951 drama Black Sky (1951).Bentley p.113 ==Selected filmography== * White Horse Inn (1948) * Black Sky (1951) * Such is Madrid (1953) * Return to the Truth (1956) * Count Max (1957) * John Paul Jones (1959) * Revolt of the Mercenaries (1961) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Bentley, Bernard. A Companion to Spanish Cinema. Boydell & Brewer, 2008. ==External links== * Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish film actresses Category:Actresses from Madrid Category:Spanish child actresses Category:Expatriate actresses in the United States Category:Spanish expatriates in the United States
title: Susana Canales
